Authors and Citation

Authors

  • Lindesay Scott-Hayward. Author, maintainer, copyright holder.
    Lindesay Scott-Hayward wrote the original main code and continues to develop and maintain code

  • Cameron Walker. Author, copyright holder.
    Cameron Walker wrote the original SALSA functions

  • Monique Mackenzie. Author, copyright holder.
    Monique Mackenzie wrote SALSA code and provides testing, bugfixes and new ideas

  • Cornelia Oedekoven. Contributor.
    Cornelia Oedekoven wrote code for distance sampling

Citation

Source: inst/CITATION

Scott-Hayward L, Mackenzie M, Walker C, Donovan C, Ashe E (2014). “Complex Region Spatial Smoother CReSS.” Journal of Computational and Graphical Statistics, 23(2), 340-360.
